response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time, so I encourage you to consider this fantastic deal before it expires. Should you choose to accept, I assure you a seamless transaction and prompt delivery. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
